mapper.select:
select e.* from enquiry e left join material m on e.material_id = m.material_id where e.create_date_time in ( select max(create_date_time) from enquiry group by belong_id )
and m.material_name like concat('%',#{materialName}, '%')
order by e.material_id desc
limit #{pagination.pageIndex, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{pagination.limit, jdbcType = INTEGER}
